author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Jazz Nite, By the Bay
text:
Jazz Nite, By the Bay Oct 01, 2015 Performing in the By the Bay Jazz Nite are, clockwise from lower right, guest vocalist Cindy Millar; and trio members Shaun Bolduc, Dennis Gurgul and Dick White. 
Thomaston — By the Bay Jazz Trio will present a Jazz Nite with guest vocalist Cindy Millar Friday, Oct. 9, from 6:30 to 8:30 p.m. at The Highlands Coffee House, 189 Main St./Route 1. 
The trio plays arrangements of jazz classics by many composers from the Golden Age of American Song, as well as numerous Latin rhythm standards. By the Bay features Dennis Gurgul of Tenants Harbor on percussion, Shaun Bolduc of Pittston on bass and Dick White of Warren on guitar. Vocalist Millar is from Washington. For more information, call 354-4162. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
